name: AuthorTrivia
0:
”Alexa talk to author trivia”
”my author is Charles”
”what is my favorite author”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: author trivia
des: An Author trivia where you can set your favourite Author and ask to tell your favourite Author. You can set favourite Author by saying my Author is ... and get your Author by whats's my favourite Author.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
